text.div:
NKRS - pN

The data item records the absence or presence and extent of regional lymph node metastasis, based on pathological evidence after completion of surgical therapy.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-crl/CodeSystem/nkrs-pn

name: NkrspN
title: NKRS - pN

contact.name: Foundation National Institute for Cancer Epidemiology and Registration (NICER)

description: The data item records the absence or presence and extent of regional lymph node metastasis, based on pathological evidence after completion of surgical therapy.
